input.sentences: i found a pretty bird with jet black feathers and some bright red ones on its wings .
then i saw this weird looking flower when i heard a strange sound .
where did it come from ? this bored looking walrus !
he 's just watching these birds in the sky .
i watched with it until they flew out of sight .
output.sentences: Marin, who had spent 7 days being a caregiver, decided to have a solitary day to enjoy the red-wing blackbirds and other wildlife.
She heard something buzzing on the flower, but she couldn't find it.
At the beach she saw a lone walrus.
She soaked in the sun as she watched the gulls soar overhead.
Marin wished she could fly away with the birds.
